text: David Lee Roth (born October 10, 1954) is an American rock singer-songwriter, musician, author, and radio personality. He was the lead singer of hard rock band Van Halen across two stints from 1974 to 1985 and again since 2006. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:American rock singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American heavy metal singers Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:American radio personalities Category:American rock guitarists Category:Singers from Indiana Category:Musicians from Indiana Category:Writers from Indiana Category:People from Bloomington, Indiana Category:Van Halen members
title: David Lee Roth
